name: JSON
description: Read and write data in JSON format.

conditions.name: Has key
conditions.description: Test if a key exists in the JSON data.

conditions.name: Compare type
conditions.description: Test the type of a value in the JSON data.

params.name: Type
params.description: The type of the value to test for.

conditions.name: Compare value
conditions.description: Compare the value at a key in the JSON data.

conditions.name: For each
conditions.description: Repeat the event for each key/value under a key in the JSON data.

conditions.name: On parse error
conditions.description: Triggered when parsing a JSON string fails.

conditions.name: Is boolean set
conditions.description: Test if a given value is the boolean value true

conditions.name: On parse success
conditions.description: Triggered when parsing a JSON string completes successfully.

actions.name: Parse
actions.description: Parse a JSON string and load its contents in to the object.

params.name: JSON string
params.description: A string of JSON data to parse.

actions.name: Set path
actions.description: Set the current path that relative paths refer to.

actions.name: Set value
actions.description: Set the value at a key in the JSON data.

params.name: Value
params.description: The value to set at the given key.

actions.name: Set array
actions.description: Set an array at a key, or resize an existing array if already present.

params.name: Size
params.description: The number of elements in the array.

actions.name: Set object
actions.description: Set an empty object at a key.

actions.name: Set null
actions.description: Set the special value 'null' at a key.

actions.name: Set boolean
actions.description: Set a true or false value at a key.

actions.name: Delete key
actions.description: Delete a key from the JSON data.

actions.name: Push value
actions.description: Add a value to the front or back of an array located at the key in the JSON data.

params.name: Where
params.description: Whether to insert at the beginning or the end of the array.

params.name: Value
params.description: The value to add at the given key.

actions.name: Pop value
actions.description: Remove a value to the front or back of an array located at the key in the JSON data.

params.name: Where
params.description: Whether to insert at the beginning or the end of the array.

actions.name: Set JSON
actions.description: Set a value from a JSON string at a key.

params.name: JSON string
params.description: The value to set at the location, as a JSON string.

actions.name: Toggle boolean
actions.description: Invert the value of a boolean field at a given key.

actions.name: Subtract from
actions.description: Subtract from the value of a numerical field at a given key.

params.name: Value
params.description: Value to subtract from this field.

actions.name: Add to
actions.description: Add to the value of a numerical field at a given key.

params.name: Value
params.description: Value to add to this field.

actions.name: Insert value
actions.description: Modifies an array by inserting a value between existing elements

params.name: Value
params.description: Value to add to the array.

params.name: Path
params.description: Location of the array within the JSON data.

params.name: Index
params.description: Index to insert the value into the array.

actions.name: Remove values
actions.description: Modifies an array by removing elements from a given location

params.name: Path
params.description: Location of the array within the JSON data.

params.name: Index
params.description: Index to start removing elements from the array.

expressions.name: ToCompactString
expressions.description: Return the current JSON data as a minimal string with no additional whitespace.

expressions.name: ToBeautifiedString
expressions.description: Return the current JSON data as a formatted string with line breaks and indentation.

expressions.name: Get
expressions.description: Get a value from a key in the JSON data.

expressions.name: Type
expressions.description: Get the type of a value at a key.

expressions.name: ArraySize
expressions.description: Get the size of an array at a key.

expressions.name: CurrentKey
expressions.description: The current key during a for each loop.

expressions.name: CurrentValue
expressions.description: The current value during a for each loop.

expressions.name: CurrentType
expressions.description: The type of the current value during a for each loop.

expressions.name: Back
expressions.description: Get the last value from an array located at the key in the JSON data.

expressions.name: Front
expressions.description: Get the first value from an array located at the key in the JSON data.

expressions.name: GetAsCompactString
expressions.description: Get a value from a key in the JSON data and return it as a minimal string with no additional whitespace.

expressions.name: GetAsBeautifiedString
expressions.description: Get a value from a key in the JSON data and return it as a formatted string with line breaks and indentation.
